info.title: Open Energy Platform Management Service APIs
info.description: Open Energy Platform Management Service APIs

post.description: Checks the name availability of the resource with requested resource name.

default.description: Error
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of oep resources under the given Azure Subscription ID.

200.description: Returned when the operation is successful.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns oep resource for a given name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Method that gets called if subscribed for ResourceCreationBegin trigger.

201.description: The OEP resource will be created asynchronously

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Confidential Ledger could not be created/updated)
Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: The OEP resource will be deleted asynchronously

204.description: Returned when the operation returns no content.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Method that gets called if new partition is to be added in a resource.

202.description: The data partitions will be created asynchronously

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Confidential Ledger could not be created/updated)

post.description: Method that gets called if new partition is to be removed from a resource.

202.description: The data partitions will be deleted asynchronously

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Confidential Ledger could not be created/updated)

post.description: Method that gets called when list of partitions is requested.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Confidential Ledger could not be created/updated)

get.description: List all private endpoint connections in a OAK instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: Get the specified private endpoint connection associated with the OAK Instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

put.description: Update the state of specified private endpoint connection associated with the OAK Instance.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnection
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a private endpoint connection.

201.description: The request was successful; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

delete.description: Deletes the specified private endpoint connection associated with the OAK Instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the operation completed synchronously.

202.description: The request was successful; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The private endpoint connection does not exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: List all private link resources in a OAK instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: Get the specified private link resource associated with the OAK instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: (INTERNAL - DO NOT USE) List all private endpoint connection proxies in a OAK instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

post.description: (INTERNAL - DO NOT USE) Validates a private endpoint connection proxy object.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionProxy
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a private endpoint connection proxy.

200.description: Validate private endpoint connection proxy empty response.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: (INTERNAL - DO NOT USE) Get the specified private endpoint connection proxy associated with the OAK Instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

put.description: (INTERNAL - DO NOT USE) Creates or updates the specified private endpoint connection proxy resource associated with the OAK instance.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnectionProxy
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a private endpoint connection proxy.

201.description: The request was successful; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

delete.description: (INTERNAL - DO NOT USE) Deletes the specified private endpoint connection proxy associated with the OAK Instance.

200.description: The request was successful; the operation completed synchronously.

202.description: The request was successful; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The private endpoint connection does not exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure.

get.description: Lists the available operations of Microsoft.OpenEnergyPlatform resource provider.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

GroupIdParameter.name: groupId
GroupIdParameter.description: The group ID of the private link resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyIdParamete.name: privateEndpointConnectionProxyId
PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyIdParamete.description: The ID of the private endpoint connection proxy object.

maxAgeInSeconds.description: Max amount of time that a browser than cache the preflight OPTIONS request

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of oep resources list.

DataPartitionNames.description: The list of Energy services resource's Data Partition Names.

DataPartitionAddOrRemoveRequest.description: Defines the partition add/ delete action properties.

DataPartitionProperties.description: Defines the properties of an individual data partition.

dataPartitionInfo.description: List of data partitions along with their properties in a given OEP resource.

EnergyServiceProperties.description: The properties of an Energy service resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the OAK resource.

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the OAK resource.

keySource.description: The encryption keySource (provider). Possible values (case-insensitive):  Microsoft.Keyvault

keyName.description: The name of the key vault key.

keyVersion.description: The version of the key vault key.

keyVaultUri.description: The Uri of the key vault.

userIdentity.description: The user assigned identity (ARM resource id) that has access to the key.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

EnergyResourceUpdate.description: The resource model definition used for updating a tracked ARM resource.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

EnergyServiceUpdateProperties.description: The properties of an Energy service resource patch.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: The available private link resources for an Account

value.description: The list of available private link resources for an Account

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private link resources.

GroupInformation.description: The group information for creating a private endpoint on an Account

properties.description: The properties for a group information object

GroupInformationProperties.description: The properties for a group information object

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of private link group ID.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyListResult.description: The available private endpoint connection proxies for an Account (not to be used by anyone, here because of ARM requirements)

value.description: The list of available private endpoint connection proxies for an Account

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private endpoint connection proxies.

properties.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object property bag.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection proxy resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyProperties.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object properties.

location.description: ARM location of the remote private endpoint.

immutableSubscriptionId.description: Original subscription ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

immutableResourceId.description: Original resource ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections.description: List of private link service connections that need manual approval.

privateLinkServiceConnections.description: List of automatically approved private link service connections.

privateLinkServiceProxies.description: List of private link service proxies.

remotePrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Remote private link service connection state

ConnectionDetails.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object properties.
